text: Tallahaga Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Tallahaga is a name derived from the Choctaw language meaning "standing rock"; this name was applied to the stream due to a rock formation on its course. Variant names are "Standing Stone Creek", "Talla Haga Creek", "Tallahag Creek", and "Tallahoga Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Choctaw County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Neshoba County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Winston County, Mississippi
title: Tallahaga Creek
